name: Virat Kohli
bio: Virat Kohli is one of the most prolific batsmen in modern cricket. Known for his aggressive playing style and consistency, he has set numerous records and is considered one of the greatest batsmen of all time.

name: Rohit Sharma
bio: Rohit Sharma is known for his elegant batting style and ability to play big innings. He holds the record for the highest individual score in a One Day International match with 264 runs.

name: Jasprit Bumrah
bio: Jasprit Bumrah is known for his unique bowling action and deadly yorkers. He is one of the top fast bowlers in the world and a crucial player for India in all formats.

name: Ravindra Jadeja
bio: Ravindra Jadeja is an exceptional allrounder known for his left-arm spin bowling and aggressive batting. His fielding is also top-notch, making him a valuable player for the Indian team.

name: KL Rahul
bio: KL Rahul is a versatile batsman who can play both as an opener and in the middle order. He is also a reliable wicketkeeper and has been a key player for India in recent years.

name: Hardik Pandya
bio: Hardik Pandya is an explosive allrounder known for his hard-hitting batting and handy medium-pace bowling. He is a match-winner who can change the course of the game with his performances.

name: Rishabh Pant
bio: Rishabh Pant is known for his fearless batting and exceptional wicketkeeping skills. His aggressive approach and ability to score quick runs make him a valuable asset in all formats.
